title.narrative: DFID Strengthening Public Financial Management Competence in Tanzania

description.narrative: This programme will support the Government of Tanzania to make better fiscal policies, improve allocation of financial resources and spend them efficiently and effectively.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: 6th Floor Queen Elizabeth House, 4 St Dunstans Hill, EC3R 8AD
